title: Fiskars RazorEdge Micro-Tip Easy Action Scissors - 5" Stainless Steel Shears - Fabric Scissors All Purpose for Arts and Crafts - Orange
description: Fiskars Micro-Tip Small Easy Action Small Scissors are perfect for tight, precise cuts. Fiskars fabric scissors feature high-grade stainless steel blades with a nimble Micro-Tip point for unmatched control when cutting intricate details and patterns out of fabric. These scissors feature an Easy Action design that automatically opens the blades after every cut, offering comfort and greatly reducing hand fatigue. A SoftGrip handle offers a more comfortable grip and improved control.
